pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parallelized Minimum Redundancy, Maximum Relevance (mRMR) // Computes mutual information matrices from continuous, categorical and survival variables, as well as feature selection with minimum redundancy, maximum relevance (mRMR) and a new ensemble mRMR technique. Published in De Jay et al. (2013) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btt383.
